tuv.seg: Learner driving permits for cars and work vehicles
Ceadúnais tiomána foghlaimeora le haghaidh carranna agus feithiclí oibre

It is a statutory requirement that you must hold at least a learner driving permit (previously known as a provisional licence) for the appropriate category of vehicle if you want to drive a car or work vehicle in a public place. You are required to carry your learner permit with you at all times when driving

Is ceanglas reachtúil atá ann nach mór duit ar a laghad ceadúnas tiomána foghlaimeora (ar a dtugtaí ceadúnas sealadach roimhe seo) a bheith agat don chatagóir chuí feithicle más mian leat carr nó feithicil oibre a thiomáint in áit phoiblí
This document explains how to apply for or renew a learner permit for a car or work vehicle
Ní mor duit do cheadúnas foghlaimeora a bheith leat an t-am ar fad nuair atá tú ag tiomáint
To apply for a learner permit, you must be normally resident in Ireland
Ní mór duit gnáthchónaí a bheith ort in Éirinn chun iarratas a dhéanamh ar cheadúnas foghlaimeora
If you usually live here for at least 185 days in each calendar year (because of personal and occupational ties), you are considered to be normally resident in Ireland
Meastar go bhfuil gnáthchónaí in Éirinn ort má bhíonn cónaí ort anseo go hiondúil ar feadh ar a laghad 185 lá i ngach bliain féilire (mar gheall ar cheangal pearsanta agus ceirde)
The Road Safety Authority now has responsibility for driver licensing and has set up a new National Driver Licence Service (NDLS)
Ó 19 Eanáir, 2013, tá an tÚdarás um Shábháilteacht ar Bhóithre freagrach as ceadúnú tiománaithe
In addition, the application process has changed and, when applying for a learner permit, you have to visit one of the new NDLS centres
Mar chuid den phróiseas iarratais duine-le-duine, beidh do grianghraf agus do shíniú go digiteach a ghabháil
As part of the face-to-face application process, your photo and your signature is captured digitally
Cuirfear iad seo san áireamh sa táille atá ann cheana féin. Beidh ort an doiciméadú breise chun do chéannacht a dhearbhú
You have to bring additional documentation to confirm your identity
Tá tuilleadh eolais ar fáil ar an láithreán gréasáin NDLS
A new plastic-card learner permit has been introduced, replacing the paper learner permit
Faigheann aon duine a dhéanann iarratas ar cheadúnas nó cead foghlaimeora ó 12 Eanáir, 2013 ar an leagan nua
This is an EU initiative to introduce a secure, compact style of licence in all member states
Is tionscnamh AE a thabhairt isteach slán, stíl dlúth ceadúnais i ngach ballstát
The number of driving licence categories has increased and the minimum age requirement for certain categories has changed also
Chomh maith leis sin, méadú ar líon na tiomána chatagóirí ceadúnais agus an riachtanas aois íosta le haghaidh catagóirí áirithe a athrú
Further information is available on the Road Safety Authority's website
Tá tuilleadh eolais ar fáil ar shuíomh gréasáin an Údaráis um Shábháilteacht ar Bhóithre
Before you begin to learn to drive on public roads in Ireland, you must hold a learner permit covering the category of vehicle you wish to drive
Sula dtosaíonn tú ag foghlaim tiomána ar bhóithre poiblí in Éirinn, ní mór duit ceadúnas foghlaimeora a bheith agat a chuimsíonn an chatagóir feithicle is mian leat a thiomáint
A learner permit to drive a car or work vehicle is usually valid for 2 years
Is gnách go mbíonn ceadúnas foghlaimeora chun carr nó feithicil oibre a thiomáint bailí ar feadh 2 bhliain
Car drivers with a learner permit must be accompanied at all times by, and be under the supervision of, someone with a current driving licence for a car
Ní mór do dhuine a bheith in éineacht le tiománaithe carranna ag a bhfuil ceadúnas foghlaimeora an t-am ar fad, agus bheith faoi mhaoirsiú duine ag a bhfuil ceadúnas reatha tiomána do charr
Also, the person accompanying you must have had the driving licence for at least 2 years
Chomh maith leis sin, ní mór don duine atá in éineacht leat an ceadúnas tiomána a bheith aige/aici ar feadh 2 bhliain ar a laghad

Work vehicle drivers with a learner permit are not allowed to carry a passenger unless the vehicle is designed to carry a passenger and the passenger is a qualified driver who has held his driving licence for a work vehicle for the last 2 years at least

Ní cheadaítear do thiománaithe feithiclí oibre ag a bhfuil ceadúnas foghlaimeora paisinéir a iompar murar dearadh an fheithicil le paisinéir a iompar agus gur tiománaí cáilithe an paisinéir a bhfuil a c(h)eadúnas tiomána aige/aici le haghaidh feithicil oibre ar feadh 2 bhliain roimhe sin ar a laghad
If you hold a learner permit for a car, you are not allowed to drive a car drawing a trailer, drive on a motorway, act as an accompanying driver or carry other people for reward

Má tá ceadúnas foghlaimeora agat do charr, ní cheadaítear duit tiomáint agus leantóir á tharraingt agat; tiomáint ar an mótarbhealach; feidhmiú mar thiománaí tionlacain; nó daoine eile a iompar ar luach saothair
Learner permit holders for cars must display L-plates to the front and rear of the vehicle they are driving at all times
Ní mór do shealbhóirí ceadúnais foghlaimeora L-phlátaí a bheith ar taispeáint chun tosaigh agus ar chúl na feithicle atá á tiomáint i gcónaí
The plate should be a red ‘L’ on a white background and should not be less than 15cm high with a border of at least 2cm
Ba chóir go mbeadh an pláta ina ‘L’ dearg ar chúlra bán agus níor cheart iad a bheith níos lú ná 15cm ar airde agus le teorainn ar a laghad 2cm
Since October 2011 the drink driving limit for car drivers with learner permits and those in their first two years on a full driving licence is reduced to 20mg/100ml of blood

Ó Dheireadh Fómhair 2011 i leith, tá laghdú tagtha ar an teorainn um thiomáint ar meisce do thiománaithe caranna ag a bhfuil ceadúnais foghlaimeora agus iad siúd ag a bhfuil ceadúnais iomlána tiomána acu don chéad dá bhliain, chuig 20mg/100ml fola
It applies to all drivers of work vehicles
Baineann seo don uile thiománaí feithiclí oibre

It remains at the lower threshold while they drive under a learner permit and subsequently during the first two years while they drive under their first driving licence. Further information is available on the Road Safety Authority website
Tá fáil ar fhaisnéis ar bhearta eile a bheartaítear chun tiománaithe foghlaimeora agus neamhchleachtacha a chosaint ar láithreán gréasáin an Údaráis um Shábháilteacht ar Bhóithre
The rules of the road are available at rulesoftheroad.ie
Is féidir leat rialacha an bhóthair a léamh ag rotr.ie
Car and work vehicle categories
Catagóirí carranna agus feithiclí oibre
The categories and driver's minimum age for car and work vehicles are as follows:
Is iad seo a leanas na catagóirí carranna agus d’fheithiclí oibre mar aon leis na haoiseanna íosta chun iad a thiomáint:
│Category│Vehicle type │age of │
│Catagóir│Cineál feithicle │Aois íosta an tiománaí │
│ │Vehicles with seats for a maximum of 8 passengers and a maximum │17 │
Má d’éag do cheadúnas sealadach nó do cheadúnas foghlaimeora 5 bliana ó shin, ní mór duit pas a fháil sa tástáil teoirice arís sula n-eiseofar ceadúnas foghlaimeora
│B │weight of 3,500kg (can tow a trailer where the maximum weight of │years │
Ní mór tabhairt faoi 12 cheacht a mhaireann uair an chloig le teagascóir ceadaithe tiomána
│ │the trailer when fully loaded is 750kg or less) │ │
Déantar do dhul chun cinn a thaifeadadh i logleabhar speisialta
│W │Work vehicles with or without a trailer, such as a land tractor or│16 │
Nuair a bhíonn an tástáil tiomána á déanamh agat, b’fhéidir go mbeidh gá do logleabhar comhlánaithe a thaispeáint don scrúdaitheoir
Your first learner permit
Do thríú ceadúnas foghlaimeora
You must have a valid driver theory test certificate for car and work vehicle categories before a first learner permit will be granted
Ní féidir leat iarratas a dhéanamh ar an tríú cheadúnas nó ar aon cheann ina dhiaidh sin murar féidir leat a chruthú:
If your learner permit expired 5 years ago, then you must pass the theory test again before a learner permit will be issued
nó • Fianaise de dháta tástála atá ag teacht aníos (ceadófar ceadúnas foghlaimeora ar feadh bliana)
Since 4 April 2011 new first-time category B learner permit holders are required to undertake mandatory essential driver training (EDT) of 12 one-hour lessons with an approved driving instructor
Cé nach mór duit do cheadúnas foghlaimeora a bheith leat an t-am ar fad nuair atá tú ag tiomáint, níl aon iachall ort faoin dlí do cheadúnas a athrú má athraíonn tú d’ainm nó do sheoladh
Your progress is recorded in a special logbook
Moltar duit é sin a dhéanamh, áfach
You should also have an experienced driver who supervises your driving practice outside of lessons, and also updates your logbook
Tá iachall ort fianaise de do cheadúnas a thaispeáint má iarrann an Garda Síochána ort é sin a dhéanamh, agus ar an ábhar sin, ba chóir faisnéis chothrom le dáta a bheith ar do cheadúnas
When taking the driving test, you may be required to show your completed logbook to the examiner
Beidh ort iarratas a dhéanamh ar cheann de na hionaid NDLS agus beidh tú ag teastáil doiciméid tacaíochta, mar shampla, deimhniú pósta bunaidh
A list of approved driving instructors is available on the Road Safety Authority’s website
Cén catagóirí eile is féidir liom a chur le mo cheadúnas foghlaimeora gan teastas tástála teoirice?
You cannot take a driving test for at least 6 months after getting your first learner permit
Má tá ceadúnas foghlaimeora do chatagóir B agat cheana féin, is féidir leat catagóir W a chur leis gan teastas tástála teoirice a chur ar aghaidh
Your third learner permit
Conas a ionadaím ceadúnas foghlaimeora a cailleadh nó a goideadh?
You may not apply for a third or subsequent learner permit unless you can provide:
Ceann dúblach nó cóip chruinn de do cheadúnas bunúil foghlaimeora a bheidh sa cheadúnas ionaid
• Evidence that you have undergone a driving test in the 2-year period prior to the application (a 2-year learner permit will be granted) or
Má d’éag do cheadúnas foghlaimeora agus mura bhfuil sé bailí a thuilleadh, ní féidir leat ach iarratas a dhéanamh ar cheadúnas nua foghlaimeora
• Evidence of a forthcoming test date (a 1-year learner permit will be granted)
Is féidir leat teacht ar níos mó faisnéise inár ndoiciméad maidir le ceadúnas Éireannach foghlaimeora a cailleadh nó a goideadh
Learner permits for cars and work vehicles are valid for 2 years (or 1 year in certain circumstances) and since January 2013 the fee is €35
Tá ceadúnais foghlaimeora do charranna agus d’fheithiclí bailí ar feadh 2 bhliain (nó 1 bhliain faoi chúinsí áirithe) agus ó 1 Eanáir 2013 is é an táille €35
They are free of charge to those aged 70 or over
Tá siad saor in aisce dóibh siúd atá 70 bliain d’aois nó níos sine
Information on acceptable forms of payment is available on the application form
Tá sé saor in aisce ceadúnas foghlaimeora a mhalartú chun ainm nó seoladh nua a thaispeáint
Any required eyesight tests or medical examinations are not free of charge
Tá eolas maidir le cineálacha inghlactha íocaíochta ar an bhfoirm iarratais

You have to apply in person to one of the NDLS centres. You do not have to provide photographs with your application but you do need to bring additional documents with you in order to confirm you are the person who is applying for the driving licence
Má tá iarratas á dhéanamh agat ar cheadúnas foghlaimeora chun tiomáint, ba chóir duit iarrtas a dhéanamh ar cheadúnas do chatagóir B chun carr a thiomáint agus W chun feithicil oibre a thiomáint
If you have a learner permit or Irish driving licence, you need to bring evidence of your PPS Number and proof of address
Beidh ort iarratas a dhéanamh go pearsanta go dtí ceann de na hionaid NDLS
If you do not have a learner permit or an Irish driving licence, you need to bring photographic ID, proof of your residency entitlement, evidence of your PPS Number and proof of address
Má tá tú faoi láthair ar tiomána ceadúnas / cead foghlaimeora Éireannach, is gá duit a thabhairt leat an gceadúnas / cead agus fianaise d'Uimhir PSP
See ‘Proof of identity’ below
Féach 'Cruthúnas céannachta' alt thíos
You apply for or renew a learner permit using the learning permit application form (D201) which is available from NDLS centres, driving test centres, driving theory test centres and Garda stations
Sula ndéanann tú iarratas ar do chéad cheadúnas foghlaimeora, ní mór duit teastas tástála teoirice tiomána a fháil ar dtús
You can also download the learner permit application form (pdf) as well as guidance notes (pdf)
Tá an teastas tástála teoirice bailí ar feadh 2 bhliain ó dháta na heisiúna
Applying for your first learner permit
Ba cheart go ngabhfaidh an méid a leanas le foirm chomhlánaithe iarratais D.201:
The completed application form D.201 should be accompanied by:
• Teastas breithe nó pas nó teastas cláraithe Níl seo ina riachtanas má
• Your current or last driving licence and/or learner permit if you have one
• Do cheadúnas reatha nó deireanach tiomána agus/nó do cheadúnas foghlaimeora má tá ceann agat
• Your driver theory test certificate
• Do theastas tástála teoirice tiomána
• A Driving Licence Eyesight Report Form
• Tuairisc ar radharc na súl, Foirm D.502
A completed eyesight report form must accompany all first learner permit applications - see below
Ní mór go ngabhfaidh tuairisc chomhlánaithe ar radharc na súl le gach iarratas céaduaire ar cheadúnas foghlaimeora – féach thíos
• A Driving Licence Medical Report Form may be required - see below
• Tuairisc liachta, Foirm D.501. Teastaíonn tuairisc liachta faoi chúinsí áirithe – féach thíos
• The appropriate fee - see 'Rates' above
• An táille chuí – féach Rátaí thuas
Applying for your second learner permit
Iarratas a dhéanamh ar do dhara ceadúnas foghlaimeora
When applying for your second learner permit the completed application form D.201 should be accompanied by:
Nuair a bhíonn iarratas á dhéanamh agat ar do dhara cheadúnas foghlaimeora, ba cheart go ngabhfaidh an méid a leanas le foirm chomhlánaithe iarratais D.201:
• Your last learner permit
• Do cheadúnas foghlaimeora deireanach
• A Driving Licence Medical Report Form may be required - see below
• Tuairisc liachta, Foirm D.501
• A Driving Licence Eyesight Report Form may be required - see below
Teastaíonn tuairisc liachta faoi chúinsí áirithe – féach thíos
• The appropriate fee - see 'Rates' above
• An táille chuí – féach Rátaí thuas
Applying for your third or subsequent learner permit
Iarratas a dhéanamh ar do thríú ceadúnas foghlaimeora nó cinn ina dhiaidh sin
When applying for your third or subsequent learner permit the completed application form D.201 should be accompanied by:
Ba cheart go ngabhfaidh an méid a leanas le foirm chomhlánaithe iarratais D.201:
• Your last learner permit
• Do cheadúnas foghlaimeora deireanach
• Evidence of having taken the driving test in the previous 2 years or evidence of a forthcoming test
• Fianaise gur thug tú faoin tástáil tiomána sa 2 bhliain roimhe sin nó fianaise de thástáil a bheidh ag teacht aníos
• A Driving Licence Medical Report Form may be required - see below
• Tuairisc liachta, Foirm D.501
• A Driving Licence Eyesight Report Form may be required - see below
Teastaíonn tuairisc liachta faoi chúinsí áirithe – féach thíos
• The appropriate fee - see 'Rates' above
• An táille chuí – féach Rátaí thuas
A completed Driving Licence Eyesight Report Form must accompany all first learner permit applications
Ní mór go ngabhfaidh tuairisc chomhlánaithe ar radharc na súl, Foirm D.502, le gach iarratas céaduaire foghlaimeora – féach thíos
An eyesight report is not required where a medical report is provided unless indicated by the doctor
Ba chóir go dtabharfaidh radharceolaí oftalmach nó cleachtóir cláraithe liachta faoi do thástáil súl
It is also available from NDLS centres. A registered ophthalmic optician or a registered medical practitioner should conduct your eye test
Ba chóir dó nó di ansin Foirm D.502 a chomhlánú agus bheith ina f(h)inné ar do dhearbhú sínithe ar an bhfoirm
The report is valid for 1 month
Tá an tuairisc bailí ar feadh 1 mhí
A Driving Licence Medical Report Form is required if :
Teastaíonn tuairisc liachta, Foirm D.501, má:
• You will be 70 years of age or more on the first day of the period for which the permit is being issued or
• Bheidh tú 70 bliain d’aois nó níos sine ar an gcéad lá den tréimhse a bhfuil an ceadúnas á eisiúint di, nó
• You have any of certain disabilities or conditions (see application form)
• Tá tú faoi mhíchumas áirithe nó tá galair áirithe ort nó
You do not have to provide a medical report if you have previously provided a satisfactory medical report which is still applicable
• Glacann tú drugaí nó cógas go rialta ar dócha go mbainfidh siad de do chumas chun tiomáint go sábháilte
It is also available from NDLS centres. A registered medical practitioner should carry out your medical examination and then complete the form
Ba cheart do chleachtóir cláraithe liachta tabhairt faoi do scrúdú liachta agus an fhoirm a chomhlánú ansin
You must sign the declaration on the medical report form in the presence of the registered medical practitioner
Ní mór duit an dearbhú a shíniú ar fhoirm na tuairisce liachta i láthair an chleachtóra chláraithe liachta
The report is valid for 1 month
Tá an tuairisc bailí ar feadh 1 mhí
- Current passport for all non-Irish citizens
• Pas Reatha do gach saoránach nach as Éireann dóibh
- Current national identity card for EU/EEA/Swiss citizens
• Cárta Aitheantais Náisiúnta Reatha do Shaoránaigh an AE/EEA/na hEilvéise
- Current UK (photo) driving licence
• Ceadúnas tiomána reatha na Ríochta Aontaithe (grianghraf)
- Current Public Services Card
• Cárta Seirbhísí Poiblí Reatha
- Current Irish travel document (issued by INIS)
• Cáipéisí Taistil Éireannach Reatha
• Proof of your residency entitlement
Fianaise chun Gnáthchónaitheacht a dheimhniú
- Irish/UK long-form birth certificate or adoption certificate
• Teastas Breithe Fadfhoirme Éireannach/na Ríochta Aontaithe nó Teastas • Uchtaithe
- Current passport for all EU/EEA/Swiss citizens
• Pas Reatha do gach Saoránach an AE/EEA/na hEilvéise
- Current national identity card for EU/EEA/Swiss citizens
• Cárta Aitheantais Náisiúnta Reatha do Shaoránaigh an AE/EEA/na hEilvéise
- Current Certificate of Registration (GNIB card) for non-EU/EEA/Swiss citizens
• Teastas Cláraithe Reatha (cárta GNIB) do Shaoránaigh nach as an AE/EEA/ • Eilvéis dóibh
- Public Services Card/Social Services Card
• Cárta Seirbhísí Poiblí/ Cárta Seirbhísí Sóisialta
- Correspondence from Revenue or Social Welfare showing PPSN
• Comhfhreagras ó na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim/Leas Sóisialach ag léiriú PPSN
- P21/Tax Assessment/ Notice of tax credits
• P21/Measúnú Cánach/Fógra ar Chreidmheasanna Cánach
- Receipt of social welfare payment
• Admháil ar Íocaíocht Leasa Shóisialaigh ag léiriú do PPSN
- Medical card/Drug Payment Scheme (DPS) Card
• Cárta Leighis/ Cárta Íocaíochta um Dhrugaí (DPS)
- Utility bill from your electricity/phone/gas/cable television/broadband provider
ó do sholáthraí leictreachais/teileafóin/gáis/teilifíse
- Statement from your bank/building society/credit union
Ní ghlactar le billí fóin phóca
- Letter from the Department of Social Protection or Revenue
• Comhfhreagras le Cuideachta Árachais
Note: Proof of address documents can be no more than 6 months old at date of application
• Ráiteas ón mBanc/ón gCumann Foirgníochta /ón gComhar Creidmheasa
An application for a learner permit should be made in person to one of the National Driver Licence Service (NDLS) centres - see 'How to apply' above
• Litir ón Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí /Coimisinéirí Ioncaim
You can book an appointment online
• Comhfhreagras oifigiúil ar bith eile ón ghníomhaireacht Stáit as Éirinn
The National Driver Licence Service provides information on applying for a learner permit on its website
NOTA: Ní féidir cruthúnas seoladh dhoiciméid a bheith níos mó ná 6 mhí d'aois ar dháta an iarratais
A list of approved driving instructors is available on the Road Safety Authority’s website
Ní billí fón póca agus ráitis ó chuideachtaí cártaí siopa / chatalóg glacadh leo
National Driver Licence Service
Cá háit a ndéanfaidh mé iarratas
Road Safety Authority Moyvalley Business Park Primrose Hill Ballina Co
Ó October 29 2013, ba chóir iarratas ar cheadúnas foghlaimeora a dhéanamh go pearsanta le ceann amháin de chuid na Seirbhíse Náisiúnta Ceadúnais Tiománaithe (NDLS) ionaid
